MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Thompson Bay Project in North America dated October 2002

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Thompson Bay Project in North America dated October 2002
document.description: The report discusses the geological setting, mineralization, exploration history, and provides recommendations for the Thompson Bay Copper-Zinc Property in Flin Flon, Manitoba, Canada.
